title: 【游戏更新】3.10.4.0 更新通知
author: Yihc
txt_content:
添加项目: 
添加了 "Owner [SteamID]" 指令，允许ID玩家(前面设置的名称)在不打开控制台界面的前提，可设置服务器设置。改进项目: 
改进了PVP服中物品重刷时有30秒倒计时的提示
改进了PVE服中物品重刷时有10秒倒计时的提示改进了PVP服中退出游戏需要10秒的时间帮助指令会出现所有指令(就是输入@help就会出现所有指令)
调整: 
调整了使用give指令调出的物品属性全满
修复: 
修复了材质的问题修复了发电机范围内保存游戏的问题修复了Linux系统读取bundles无效(读取的东西是空的)的问题
修复了Linux服务器无法重刷物品的问题？
修复了睡袋的问题修复了文件检验修复了网格缓存量修复了SteamID在控制台的问题修复了睡袋取消关联会导致游戏崩溃的问题修复了进度条缓存量

感谢各位大大，提出Linux上的BUG!希望大大们还能继续找! 

周末会办场网络测试，快快来报名吧。

感谢阅读。






原文：





Additions: 
Added "Owner [SteamID]" command to allow full server setup without console.
Improvements: 
Improved respawning to have a 30 second home timer on PvP servers. 
Improved respawning to have a 10 second rapid respawn timer. 
Improved leaving to have a 10 second timer on PvP servers. 
Improved help command to sort alphabetically.
Tweaks: 
Tweaked give command to create full items.
Fixes: 
Fixed crazy insane wow texture bug. 
Fixed saving generator state. 
Fixed Linux loading empty bundles. 
Fixed Linux server redistributables? 
Fixed placing beds. 
Fixed detecting whether files are needed or not. 
Fixed networking buffer size. 
Fixed SteamID commands when not on server. 
Fixed crash when unclaiming beds. 
Fixed loading state buffer size.
Thanks to everyone providing help crushing bugs on Linux! Keep it up! 

This weekend I'll likely put out a networking test, heads up. 

Thanks for reading!
